Add and manage your water intake reminders on Chrome Newtab 

Sip Alert! ðŸ’§ Time to Boost Your Water Intake.

Remember, staying hydrated has numerous benefits, from boosting your energy levels to supporting overall health. So, let's make a splash â€“ drink up!

How to use Sip App Extension
1. Open newtab and set your water intake goals. You can configure your goals by clicking on settings icon in top left of the newtab page. 
2. Get reminded when it is time for you to take a sip. 
3. Every time you take a sip just add it in your extension by clicking  "Save Drink". 
4. Review your intake history by going to settings and clicking on ""Intake History 

This extension updates your browser New Tab and provides:
- Reminder and widget to manage your water intake 
- A Web Search box - search results are provided by Yahoo 
- Top sites (Site links below search box)

By installing this extension, you agree to the Terms of Service (https://getsipapp.com/terms-of-service/) and Privacy Policy (https://getsipapp.com/privacy-policy/)
